m_displayName: WEAPON - ENIRIPSA - SCALPEL DE L APOSTRUKER - Soin Apostruker

description.fr:
Lorsqu'un allié est soigné : Votre héros déclenche son passif.
\---
Lorsque vous déclenchez {#SUPPORT}\_: Soigne la cible de {#SUPPORT} de {PVvalue:heal}.
\---
<rem>{%DAMAGE_BASED_ON_ELEMENTARY}</rem>
description.en:
When an ally is healed: Your hero triggers their passive.
\---
When you trigger {#SUPPORT}: Heals the target of the {#SUPPORT} {PVvalue:heal}.
\---
<rem>{%DAMAGE_BASED_ON_ELEMENTARY}</rem>
description.es:
Cuando un aliado es curado: Tu héroe activa su pasivo.
\---
Cuando activas {#SUPPORT}: Cura al objetivo de {#SUPPORT} {PVvalue:heal}.
\---
<rem>{%DAMAGE_BASED_ON_ELEMENTARY}</rem>
description.de:
Wenn ein Verbündeter geheilt wird: Dein Held löst seine passive Fähigkeit aus.
\---
Wenn du {#SUPPORT} auslöst: Heilt das Ziel der {#SUPPORT} um {PVvalue:heal}.
\---
<rem>{%DAMAGE_BASED_ON_ELEMENTARY}</rem>
description.pt:
Quando um aliado é curado: Seu herói aciona seu passivo.
\---
Quando você aciona {#SUPPORT}: Cura {PVvalue:heal} do alvo do {#SUPPORT}.
\---
<rem>{%DAMAGE_BASED_ON_ELEMENTARY}</rem>
